### Getting Started

# Configuration

## Configure your project settings

Learn how to customize your project configuration.

The main configuration file is located at the root of your project. It controls various aspects of your documentation site including theme, navigation, and build settings.

### Theme configuration

Customize the look and feel of your documentation:

- Primary color
- Font settings
- Code block themes

### Navigation configuration

Control how your documentation is organized:

- Sidebar structure
- Header links
- Footer content

### Build configuration

Configure the build process:

- Output directory
- Base URL
- Prerendering options

For detailed configuration options, see the [Configuration API Reference](page:config-reference).
